content.detailedDescription:
Bonjour, je me suis rã©veiller dans la nuit, et je n'avais jamais eu autant de difficultã© a m'ouvrir les yeux, mes deux chiens jappais sans arrãªt comme si il y avait quelqu'un dehors, je suis sorti dehors, sur le balcon, mes chiens y passait la nuit, je tentais de voir aprã¨s quoi il en voulait.
j'avais toujours autant de difficultã© a laisser mes yeux ouvert, puis j'ai dã©cider de regarder mes chiens pour voir ou il regardait, il ã©tait tous les deux, les pattes avant sur la rampe, et regardait vers le ciel, ce que j'ai fait ã©galement, (regarder vers le ciel) il y avait un vaisseau noir, qui avait une lumiã¨re au sol, il ã©clairait quelque chose, je crois qu'il espã©rait que je ne les remarques pas, je regardais le vaisseau et je regardais la rã©action des chiens en mãªme temps sans bouger, seulement mes yeux bougeais,  puis le fait que je les avait vu, il on remonter le faisceau, trã¨s lentement,  une lumiã¨re trã¨s blanche qui remontait par ã©tape, jusqu'au vaisseau, ca n'existe pas sur terre une telle lumiã¨re, il on fait environ 500 pied lentement comme si il attendait un bon jour, je n'osait  pas parler, un peu figer, il se sont arrãªter, on changer de direction vers le ciel et on disparu en 1/2 seconde sans bruit, je ne peut pas dire que je regrette de ne pas avoir parler, mais j'ai senti un profond respect lors de cette rencontre.
content.summary: Objet noir qui observait quelque chose au sol, je les ai dã©ranger, il on ferner leur lumiere qui ã©clairait au sol, un faisceau etrange pas comme les lampes que l,on a, une lumiere qui remontait vers le ciel par ã©tape, puis ils avancer sur peut etre 100

content.detailedDescription: I woke to use the restroom early on dec.28 2013 and as i returned to my room i stopped to shutoff my boys tv they left on after falling asleep. one of them had also opened their bedroom window and blinds. as i went to close the window i looked out and seen a very bright star i thought was jupiter brightly shinning until it started to pulse and flash a few times. then stop and pulse like it was flashing morse code.I have lived all my life near the airport and know the flash of an airplane which this pulsing light was not. i instantly thought grab my phone and get pics of it going dim then bright to show my wife. so i aimed and zoomed in and started taking pics as fast as i could push the button. she thinks im crazy for believing in ufos then it started this morse code looking pulses like there was intent to the pulses. thats when i switched to video and started recording but i could not zoom in while doing video. so i used the window ledge and just tried to be as steady as possible. even moving to show the bus garage next door out the window i was looking out. as i watched it morse code pulse, to my amazement another light appeared from nowhere and they seemed in my opinion to be communicating to each other with pulses of light. my mind is about to explode at this point.. are you serious? i am actually getting all this with pics and video. then came the icing on the cake... no way!?! no way this is happening.. there are 3 of them pulsing. this last about a minute of all 3. then 2 lights just blink out and never come back on.. then the light left turns a warm orange glow and heads sw leaving me shaking from excitement at what i had just caught real evidence of. then i was afraid and extremely nervous a black suv was going to pull up and have some questions for me. so i made copies posted them everywhere i could put a copy and just are trying to share my stories of encounters with real evidence to back it up. 20+ pictures and over 10 mins of video.
content.summary: I seen what i thought was jupiter brightly shinning until it started to pulse and flash so i took pics and video.

content.detailedDescription: Video i shot near makapuu lighthouse. after reviewing the video i noticed a ufo,
content.summary: Object seen later in video

content.detailedDescription:
As mufon utah asst. state director i was hesitant to report this sighting being my first credible ufo sighting, but now the shoe is on the other foot. 
to set the stage, my balcony looks east to the wasatch front. to the north is ben lomond, directly east from is mt ogden, and then southeast you can see beyond the radar towers on francis peak. my home is right on the flight pattern of ogden airport (1/3 mile), hill air force base (3 miles), and salt lake city intl. (20 miles). so lights in the sky has been has been a part of my life for nearly 45 years. 
on 03/11/2016 i woke up at 0505 did my morning ritual, walked over to the sliding glass door, poked my head through the curtains, saw a light 1000 ft. above and behind mt. ogden (9505 elevation), azimuth 40 degrees n41e. i first thought it was a star but then it flashed and moved upward and then very slowly headed nw toward ogden. i had to put both hands up to the glass door and face to block out the surrounding light on the glass to get a clearer picture. randomly the light would flash 2-3 times a pure clean white light in comparison with a strobe light. then randomly a pure clean red flash located below and a little forward of the white flashing light would happen. again, the lights were completely independent from each other. i knew that with my 37 years around aircraft and usaf chief of safety for 10 years, this was not in the military inventory. 
i have always had all of my ufo investigation gear next to the sliding door just in case something like this would occur i would be totally prepared. unfortunately, i had been out of town the night before on a ufo investigation and had put all of my gear downstairs in the office. 
so i hurried to turn off the security alarm, went downstairs to grab my gear, headed back up to the balcony all along being away from the sighting approximately 60-90 seconds. fortunately, when i got back it was still there. i immediately threw a few shots of my green laser light at it with no response from the ufo. it is now over downtown ogden, basically a short distance from the original sighting. you could tell that it was just starting to lose its flashing brilliance now moving nwn. within 15 seconds it faded out to the north like a gray cloudy mist and was completely gone. that was the strangest part of this whole sighting  had this been a plane i would have seen it still flying at a much further distance with the lights flashing. the speed of the object during this whole sighting was that of a small plane. 
there are many lessons learned here for me even though i've played this scenario out in my head 100's of times. take a deep breath or three, always have binoculars/monocular, green laser, night vision, camera/cell phone charged and nearby. but the big lesson i learned...Why didn't i just grab my phone 25 feet away. i may have had a chance to put it on film with something to show instead of just a witness report. if recording wouldn't have shown up then i at least gave it my best for visual evidence. just remember though, " absence on evidence, isn't evidence on absence."
content.summary: Poked my head out through the curtains and saw a flashing light above mt. ogden

content.detailedDescription:
On monday evening, 3/6/16 at exactly 10pm, i was arriving home from a local social event. i backed my car into the driveway (i always back in). while i was collecting my things, i noticed two red lights headed in my direction from the south. this wasn't out of the ordinary as we live northwest of srq airport in sarasota so we see the lights of lanes on a regular basis. once i was getting out of my car, i couldn't help but notice that there was no sound. i could see the lights of other planes far to the southeast and that wouldn't surprise me to not hear them, but these lights were so close, i should have definitely heard them with ease so they had my attention. i kept watching as they got closer and still no sound. once they were almost overhead, the lights suddenly changed color from red to white. the air around them seemed to almost look like a heatwave and as it was directly overhead, i could made out the distinct shape of a triangle with one light just behind the lead tip of the triangle and the second in the dead center. i fumbled to try to get my phone for a picture, but by the time i got it out and chose the camera app, it was too far away. the entire sighting took about 2-3 minutes. it never changed speed. when it was overhead it seemed awfully close. almost low enough to hit with a rock, but it is hard to judge because of the way the air looked around it. once it was out of sight, i went inside and told my wife what i had just witnessed and she said that while i was in the driveway, our entire tv entertainment system had locked up and then reset itself as i was coming through the door. in full disclosure, i have always been interested in the ufo phenomenon, but in my almost 50 years have never seen anything that i couldn't come up with some explanation for. this was very close and very strange. if it were not for my wife's encouragement, i probably would not have reported it at all. thank you for your time.
sincerely,
brian johnsen
content.summary: Two red lights in line traved overhead, changed to white. while overhead i could make out a wavey area in a triangle shape.

content.detailedDescription: Being abducted by an alien being who suddenly without warning shows up and uses mind control techniqes to warp perception.  feelings of this being going after my brain with intense energy to take over my thoughts to program my mind. if deterred it leaves but tries repeatedly to succeed.  seems to be aided by others.
content.summary: Being abducted by alien being

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car on the way to visit family when i noticed some objects hovering in the air above me that appeared to be circling around each other. next, two of the objects seemed to vanish and two others appeared to combine together. i was then distracted by the other passenger in the car and when i looked back, the remaining objects had vanished. shortly after, we arrived in stockbridge. we were traveling along highway 52 near hill and leeke road.
content.summary: I was going for a ride when i looked up out of the car window and saw multiple toothpick shaped objects that appeared to be moving in somewhat synchronized rotating paths.

content.detailedDescription:
This took place on a very rural place at my friends farm house where he lived with his parents. it was late at the evening, close to midnight. we were on my friends room which was located on the upper floor. he had a small window which were slightly opened because it was summertime and very hot. suddenly, out of nowhere there was a very bright light coming in from the window and we couldn't look directly at it because it was to bright. we felt the light and warmth on our faces and we both also felt this tingling-sticking sensation like it emitted electric static. we looked at it (non directly) through our hands trying to cover our eyes for a little time (1min 30 sec maybe) and all of a sudden like had we been hypnotized we ran down under to my friends parents and woke them up. we were very afraid and scared. 

the funny thing is . we have no collective memory of what took place rest of the night...
content.summary: A glowing orb(ish) entity flowing outside of the window emitting very bright light flashes, no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription: Possible enlevement et messages. suivi d'engourdissements et beaucoup de bruits extã©rieur. ( bruits d'un fort vent ou rã©acteur). j'avais 12 ans et j'ã©tais couchã©. personne autre que moi on entendu ce bruit.
content.summary: Enlevement possible.

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed a large bright object in the sky at high altitude above the lake ontario , thought to try out the iphone camera (1st time) to  perhaps catch an image of it . at 1st try realized the the flash went on automatically which i didn't want & that's when right after the 1st photo shot , to my surprise in the phone's screen i've seen the speeding one below the other large one , it left a trail & it looked quiet fuzzy obviously due to its speed . i wasn't able to follow that one in the direction it flew & i had trouble getting the correct no flash button on , lol ! then still trying , took 2 more shots in another part of the sky & still the flash was on . i was getting upset & then finally i got the flash totally off & directed the camera to pinpoint the bright object that i originally was drawn to & took the photograph & it turned out great :) still , i attempted to take 3 more pics but , lo and behold , the flash again came on , that's when i went inside & uploaded the photo into my computer . 
the sky & stars looked very nice this evening . there was an airplane in the sky , in between times trying to take those pics . of all the total time to trying to take the images i estimate it was roughly 2 1/5 min. the large object was still in the sky when i left to go indoors .
attaching file evidence ( the full sized photo & the close-up of the bright object ).
content.summary: 2 objects observed , large #1 stationary , 2nd one zipped-by in a line which left a trail .

content.detailedDescription: Shined light on a very very bright light i the sky, it shown back, but a flicka, i felt instant friendship, hard to explain, sorry for no proof just letting people know this stuff out there,
content.summary: I have tactical spot light. it responded back in flashes of calm and love. ... you dont know till you feel it. followed by 2 jets. shame..

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on west florissant rd. in ferguson, mo. about 1 p.M. i was approaching interstate 270 when i saw these objects to the northwest of my location. they looked almost like balloons one might give for a birthday, but they behaved like a flock of birds. however, they had no wings. i continued on to i-270 and pulled of at the east bound entrance. they continued to meander around in a flock like fashion. i tried to take a picture and video with my cell phone but they didn't turn out well at all. finally, i lost sight of them. it was difficult to gauge their size and again, they seemed to be about a mile and a half away and from 200 to 500 feet up. i just have never seen anything like them before in this area and it's hard to imagine a bunch of balloons just floating around in that manner. 
the only other strange sighting i've had were orange lights in the sky over jackson square in new orleans in october of 2013. those sightings i also related to mufon several months after that incident when i realized that others had had similar experiences there in the months previous. so far, i have heard nor seen anything in the media about strange sightings.

as i mentioned i took video but it is of very poor quality and i am having difficulty trying to up load it from my cell phone. i might still try to do so later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: About 3 dozen orb like objects were moving around like a flock of birds

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived a little after dark at a campground in n.W nevada. i set up my tent and started a fire ,and did a few other things to set up camp. it was a clear night ,plenty of stars out . after i got everything set up i was sitting by the campfire maybe 20 minutes when something  flashing out the corner of my eye made me turn my head ,looking to the west. i could kind of see an outline of some  hills/mountains to the west as i looked to where the flashes drew my attention,  2 bright yellow arcs appeared over the top of the hill/mountain . (at first i thought it was 2 objects,i think now it was just 1 ,moving so fast it left a trail ,it made 2 arcs flying above the hill/mountain then diving down then back up i guess) it was a bright yellow object ,no flames/jets ,the object itself was glowing yellow,strangest yellow ..Kind of like a spark shooting up out of a fire,the spark is burning and leaving a trail as it shoots up .I had never seen anything like this, i went to my truck and got my phone and turned on the video to record,i grabbed my chair and was moving it away from the fire to try and sit and get some video if it flew out from behind the hills/mountains ,i wanted to be ready to catch it on video. as i was moving the chair and keeping an eye to the sky i saw a bright orange sphere,it was also to my west,more to the south of the 1st object,i held up the phone to get video of the orange sphere ,and may have gotten a second or 2 of it on video before it disappeared and but as soon as it disappeared a  strange white streak appeared and was gone in a second ,i couldn't tell if the white streak was the orange sphere moving incredibly fast or if it was something else .But as the white streak faded the 1st object came out from behind the hill/mountain heading south kind of towards where the orange sphere was ,the bright yellow object did not leave a trail this time ,it was solid yelow from what i could see with my eyes) it appeared to skip ,but after looking at the video a thousand times ,it was actually zig zagging ,but from my point of view it headed south past where the orange object was and then appeared to flash many times and fade from sight .(on video you can see an obect flying into or out of the bright yellow object ,but it's moving so fast i can't tell which way it's going ,i'm only able to catch it on 1 frame ) (after watching the video i was able to see that after it went south past where the orange sphere was then it actually went west  away from me fading out of sight . i kept the video going a few minutes after everything was out of sight in case something else appeared . after all of them were out of sight my knees actually buckled and i finally started to breathe again. i sat with my phone in hand in the chair watching the sky for maybe an hour before trying to sleep. 
who.. or what were they ? what were they doing ?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I was at a campground in n.W. nevada, sun was down maybe 2 hours ,i was sitting by my camp fire and saw something flashing out the corner of my eye . looked over to the west and saw bright yellow object flying ,got my phone and got a few seconds of video

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in mendocino a county, california using my iphone to view images of a ketchikan, alaska webcams.  ketchikan public utilities (kpu) operates five or six views of the docks, water, distance. views, town.  every few minutes the cameras update.  today was a nice mostly clear sunny day there.  so i captured a few images, saving them.  the. i went back into the cams.  it was then i noticed the dark orb in a south facing cam.  reviewing all five cams only the two facing south had the orb.  and from two seperate locales with two seperate views, each confirming the orb as real and not matter on the camera lens.  the object was stationary but did drift slightly.  i could tell by lining up distant mountains and closeup objects.  i was very busy today but kept checking in or the cams and capturing the object.  after about three hours, one cam lost the orb.  what was weird is on the other cam it was still there.  by the time i checked again clouds had moved in.  the object was gone.
content.summary: Kpu webcams in ketchican.  i am in california. captured images on 2 seperate cam out of 5.  but only on cams south.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 21:40 a bright orb shape fell in the north eastern sky from about 60 degrees to 40 degrees. there was no tail trail usually witnessed from debris burning up in the atmosphere. it was quick and bright. there and then gone. no noise was heard, no flashes. just a white orb like object that fell. this event appeared to happen in the direction of omaha, ne from a viewpoint outside of ashland, ne.
content.summary: Bright white light fell from the north east sky, no trail, from 60 deg down to 40 deg and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Mid february. we were flying alligant air at about 25000 ft. i had the windowlooking out the window, saw a round silver object about 100 yards of the left wing.  it was a very cloudy day, it  appeared to be pacing with the aircraft,  i observed the object of and on four about 15 minutes. then it turned sidewase of bottom up. there were a ring of lghtson the bottom. the were red blue green and purple and yellow, they seemed to rotate or the ship or craft was turning very fast,in the clouds it was rather hard to lmake out. i asked one of the sturdest if shejoyed the coumpny, but she was as white as a sheet. apparently i was not the only onewho saw the unusual situation  over all it lasted about 30 minutes this time. i have others but this is far as i have been able to go, my computer shuts down , i have more4 evidence but if i go further ill be shut down agalnn, i am being under constant observation
content.summary: Oval object had markings on the lower portion of the disk stang pjatern that i wasw unfformalier with

content.detailedDescription:
My first ufo ! 

the night is very clear and the stars are bright. i saw a plane and then continued staring at the stars. 

very quickly a triangular shaped object moved overhead blocking the stars, for approximately 2 to 4 seconds. it was very quiet, and it stunned me. it was difficult to tell how big or how high the object was. i feel like it could have been hundreds of feet long and wide and up thousands...Or even a mile long, and even higher in altitude. i did not see any lights because of all the stars. the sky is absolutely filled with stars tonight. 

i then watched another plane go by.


sorry that is all i have.
content.summary: Dark triangle shape moved quickly, covering and then uncovering stars, bottom 3 of the big dipper..Moved quickly with no sound

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 5 pm on august 6, 2015 in front of the mosque in the small rural village of issoufari in niger, the witness named abdoul took a photo of his friend nassar. nassar is in a white shirt holding his shoes in photo. in front of him in the foreground of the photo approximately three feet from abdoul is a three foot tall alien grey type entity which seems to be vibrating as it stands in place (see photo). the entity's legs are higher neae its shoulders while its arms are lower towards its abdomen and more centered on the torso.
content.summary: While taking a photograph of his friend in front of a mosque, upon review saw an alien grey type entity in photo

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving home and i always look up at the sky when not having to drive.
the object looked almost like a tower light, but very bright. it was also green which is weird since most are either red or white. it never flashed. i could not tell if it were only one light first and turned into 4 or was 4 the entire time and so far out that i saw it as one. the light(s) turned from green to red and never flashed like you would expect to see with planes. in fact there are a lot of planes in the sky around at night since we live about 25 miles from the charlotte airport. i know what planes and helicopters look like. this was not anything i have ever seen before. the final shape was 4 red lights in a checkerboard shape. like imaginary perpendicular lines with 4 quadrants. each quadrant had a red light. it also must have been traveling fast! i saw it go from 11 o'clock to 5 o'clock and seemingly disappear in the span of about 30 seconds. in that short time, it hovered, changed direction suddenly, and sped off while the lights changed from one bright large green to the 4 smaller red ones in the checkerboard formation. it seemed like it was only one object though.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green light hovered, traveled very fast, changed direction all while turning to 4 red lights

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on bypass 322 at about 6:45 pm. i was driving by myself and going home from the store. it was a clear night, and the sky was a dark blue straight ahead. when i reached the top of a hill not quite to the hospital, i saw three star like objects above mt. nittany. when i first saw them, i thought they were stars, but something didn't seem right. i had never seen three "north star like" stars, (large and very bright) so close together and forming an inverted triangle at that location. from the time i first saw them, to the time i had to change lanes and look away and veer right to get on exit ramp, it was approximately 45 seconds. these objects never moved during this time, but when i looked up again, after getting on ramp, the top right object completely disappeared. again, it was a clear night, no clouds nothing obstructs view here. i turned right unto college ave to then make a left quick unto elmwood towards lemont. during this time, the bottom object was moving very slowly up, (i had to carefully look to my left and kind of back to see this as i drove. luckily the stretch of college ave is short there, and i had a green light) and by the time i turned the left unto elmwood, it was still moving very very slowly up. at this point the objects were straight ahead. i was driving on elmwood for maybe 30 seconds to light at branch road. i sat at red light, put my window down, for a couple seconds as i watched this object slowly move to right now. i turned right at green light down branch road. object went over my head and west. i heard no sounds coming from object. seemed closer to ground some how. did it descend? i lost track of object as it passed over my car and i had to turn left up a hill. i thought that by the time i got to top of hill, i would be able to see where it had gone.
at top of hill, got out of car, and could not see any such object anywhere. looked east and watched the last object for a couple minutes and it never moved. 
as i think about these objects, i am perplexed. they weren't stars because one completely disappeared, and the other moved and disappeared. could they have been planes? no, they were stationary for 45 seconds and i heard no engine. i really have no clue what they were!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw 3 star like stationary objects forming an inverted v over mt. nittany on clear night. top right object disappeared after approx. 45 seconds. bottom object moved slowly up then towards the west over my car and out of view, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv at night when i heard a light hum sound outside of my window. i turned off my tv because i caught the sight of a space craft about 500 ft. south east from my window. i got up off of my bed i was leaning on and said to myself, "yes, this is the spacecraft i have been waiting to see, as i am an avid fan out extra terrestrial entities and space craft, ( also water submerged space ships).  i noticed a cylinder sphere with lights on the silver craft, the lights were white and red passing eachother in a row back and forth.  i waved to the craft out of my window and the ship travelled in a slow figure eight then it stopped. then it flew in two circles slowly, it then travelled north west slowly over my room and the apartment buiding.  it all lasted about 35 minutes. i told my mom and dad and that was it. i have had other occurances with extra terrestrials many times, wether it was riding around the world on the bottom of an extra terrestrial space ship, or wether it is noticing other spacecrafts hovering above, or bars of light outside of my apartment window.  i have more recently viewed some triangular dark grey crafts above my window in golden valley, they flew away when i leaned over to look at them with their five white shiny lights before they took off.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looking out of my apartment window i heard a hum sound, i saw   about 500 ft. away a silvery sphere with pulsating white light on top of pulsating red light, i watched the craft do two slow figure eights and then two circles to entertain me then two circl

content.detailedDescription: I was driving saw lights in rear view mirror tthen drivers side mirror i grabbed my phone put camera on and took pic as fast as possible. i felt scared yet was in all at what i was seeing. as they went past me they started to go up , they were fastest things i have ever seen. at that point i don't remember driving rest of the way home thow i kind of came to in my drive way and 2+ hours had passed that i had no recollection or how i got home. i looked at my phone and it was real i had the picture to prove it was not a dream. i have the phone it was taken on i don't know the exact date or time i would like someone who could get into the phone and get the date& details of the photo for me so i can remember and be correct& accurate.
content.summary: Glowing orbs that were very very fast seemed to be bending gravity & space around them

content.detailedDescription:
Interesting daytime contact experience with what appears to have been three distinctive arv's. the first looked like a red and black spider, unlike any military aircraft i have yet observed, and the second looked like an irregular blimp, like two watch batteries connected perpendicular to each other. the third appeared initially to be a comet or a contrail, but maintained a relatively consistent structure (sort of like a tooth) as it moved in a steady, westward trajectory. after persistently refusing to display on my camera screen, i finally caught it, but it ended up looking more like a golden pear.

this is the third ce-5 experience i have had over the course of the past week and the first to occur in daylight. i believe it to be a direct continuation of the initial sighting reported in 75111, and i have reason to believe it will continue.
content.summary: Daytime ce-5 event in direct continuation from 75111

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard walking my dog when i saw the object, a bright glowing white light, just above the horizon to the north. it suddenly began to ascend and descend, zig-zagging at an extreme rate of speed. this lasted for about 1.5 minutes. then it hovered overhead and zipped off to the west at an unbelievable speed and disappeared. i ran inside to get my husband. we returned and waited to see if it would reappear but it did not. i was not scared but very excited.
content.summary: Bright light, extermely fast, zig zagged in multiple directions then zipped out of sight to the west.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had decided to head outside for a walk through a huge hayfield. the weather was calm and warm, skies were clear. i had brought my camera with me since i had planned on doing a fun long-exposure experiment, so i set up my tri-pod in the middle of the field to capture some shots of the milky way. as i was taking photos, i happened to look off to the horizon toward, i believe, balsam lake (the body of water, not necessarily the town). over the treetops hovered three tiny red lights. they were completely stationary at first, then began to move slowly and independently across the horizon. when they stopped moving again, i pointed them out to my wife. no sooner had i gotten the words out of my mouth when all of a sudden the sky erupted with the most vivid aurora i had ever seen in my life, coincidentally in the same direction of the objects. we sat and watched both the lights and aurora for nearly a half hour until the red lights drifted out of sight over the horizon. as the lights left, so did the aurora. it wasn't as though a massive mothership had landed before my eyes, but it was very strange none the less, especially with the northern lights!
content.summary: Tiny red lights hovering above treetops, possibly over water, moving back and forth periodically

content.detailedDescription:
The large green uap (as viewed) reappeared on on the 12th dec/2013 in the very same spot in the sky as in the previous day ( see report # 75085) .Although i've mostly witnessed it spinning in green to gold colours mostly , the photographic evidence shows a multicolour of hues . the total time as per shown in photos were from : 6:04:59 pm to the last photo at 6:25:51 pm. although it's 20 min & 51 sec , i've actually  watched the uap close to about 25 - 30 min. i was delighted for this returned spectacle ;) it is also in the very same spot in the sky , colours & similar shapes as witnessed 7 video taped back in 19th nov of 2013 ( see reports # 52819 ).
attaching few photo files with this report .
content.summary: The large uap have returned from the previous day at sunset . very large & bright , spinning & made different shapes of the craft :) it was wonderfully delightful sight to see once again & take great photos of this uap . i've kinda expected it to see it.

content.detailedDescription: I was going home and have seen it. my car had issues and stopped with no one around. so i looked up and seen some lights flashing. i thought it was the plane but quickly became clear it's not. i was frightened and 15 minutes went by like one. object disappeared over horizon.
content.summary: Flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of damage car in my body shop. after taking the pictures i forgot to turn the camera off. by accident my camera kept taking pictures in milliseconds mode.

the time was around 10:00 am, after i went to my computer to see the  pictures of the damage of the car and i saw all these other pictures taking by accident.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Start it to appear as small dot, then appear as circular light shape

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on river street in savannah georgia, taking a lot of night photos using my lumix dslr camera. when i came back to my girlfriends dorm to look at my photos from the day, we noticed the strange lights about the bridge. i have no idea what it can be.
content.summary: I was taking a 2 second exposure picture of the savannah river, including the bridge and the boat. after coming home and reviewing my pictures was when i noticed the strange arrangements of lights above the bridge.

content.detailedDescription: I love to watch te big boat come and go from the port.I have some strange filing and the beam strike me sudenly i was light like there was no gravity.Strange was i was able to see my body...Then two black helicopters whit no tags come and the orb like ufo vanish.The next day two man in black speaking perfect slovenian ask me what hapen last night..I didnt tel anithing but somehow they know that i was lying but stranger was to me it feal 2 minutes long conversation in fact i lose 1 hour.After that every monthor so i have the dream to bein the ship in every detail even the console for fliying its no stranger for me i can flight this thing.I hope to encounter this guy again.
content.summary: It was so close i can see the pilot and another two et
